name: Dungeon Crawler Cardboard VR
description:
Dungeon Crawler Cardboard VR is a life in fantasy world, where you have own castle and to upgrade it, you have to raid dungeons! There you will find different loot, gold, fierce creatures and boss - Dragon! He will incinirate you right away if you don't prepare well before meeting him, you should get a more advanced weapon to defeat him. Ready to try? Then go, towards the perils!

This game is absolutely FREE, however we'd be more than glad if you value our efforts and desire to make your VR experience unforgettable!

With time we plan to add more features to the game, such as:

1 - onscreen joypad for walking and turning head

2 - magic!

3 - chests that you should open with lock-pick (mini game)

4 - experience system and new castle with different rooms

5 - forge for upgrading your armor

6 - new dungeons

... and a lot more!

Watch the updates, give us your feedback, we hope that Dungeon Crawler Cardboard VR is that one experience that you were looking for!

_____________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY?

- Game is quite simple, point your head (cursor) on arrow in the middle of the screen to move around, open door by focusing on door knob.

- Get close to monster and focus on active (bright white) elements, to connect them into sequence. Finish sequence and your character will slain a monster.
- Kill monsters and find more advanced weapon to kill Dragon. Don't touch him from start, he's really powerful!

- Kill Dragon to complete the dungeon
